properties.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Baldwin Coastal; Santa Rosa Coastal; Mobile Coastal; Okaloosa Coastal
properties.headline: Rip Current Statement issued January 1 at 5:56AM CST until January 5 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected.

* WHERE...In Alabama, Mobile Coastal and Baldwin Coastal
Counties. In Florida, Escambia Coastal, Santa Rosa Coastal and
Okaloosa Coastal Counties.

* WHEN...From Thursday morning through late Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away
from shore into deeper water.
properties.instruction:
Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and
float. Don't swim against the current. If able, swim in a
direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the
shore and call or wave for help.

NWSheadline: HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT
